name: Adventurer's Bandana
title: Trail-Tramper: Adventurer's Bandana
desc: "All the secrets of the stars and the abyss await discovery by mere mortals."
in_play_description: After the character uses a Normal Attack: Heal self for 1 HP. (Max 3 times per Round)

skills.desc: After the character uses a Normal Attack: Heal self for 1 HP. (Max 3 times per Round) (A character can equip a maximum of 1 Artifact)
